name: Seasoned Wizards
description:
You are a wizard, and you have been cursed! The season will change every 8 seconds, and with it, your abilities. Use your unique skills in clever combinations to break the loop and restore the order of nature.

Controls

Movement - WASD

Cast spell - Left mouse button

Credits

Brin Zvan

Fernando Rodriguez Alvarez

Mathias Schifter

Jonas Gohn

Jovica Novković
